# init(_:)

**Initializer**

Creates an activity items configuration interaction.

## Declaration

```swift
init(_ rawValue: String)
```

## Creating an interaction type

- **init(rawValue:)**: Creates an activity items configuration interaction with the specified raw value.

items.description: Creates an activity items configuration interaction with the specified raw value.
items.name: init(rawValue:)
